usage.cn: 梦的最深处，只有微笑不累。
usage.eng: Dream most deep place, only then the smile is not tired.

usage.cn: 温暖是奢侈的东西，奢侈到需要用很深的寒冷和疼痛才能体现。
usage.eng: Warmness is luxury—which is reflected by deep cold and hurt.

usage.cn: 如果有人愿意让你替他承担一些事情，你已经找到了深厚的友谊了。
usage.eng: When someone allows you to bear his burdens, you have found deep friendship.

usage.cn: 在这充满温馨的季节里，给你我真挚的祝福及深深的思念
usage.eng: In such a soft and warm season, please accept my sincere blessing and deep concern for you.
